testcase.name: Test01_validation of simple demo form Two input field
testcase.system-out: Given user is on simple demo form homepage..................................passed When user enters a value of "10" and "30"...................................passed And click on Get_Total button...............................................passed Then user should see the sum of "10" and "30"...............................passed
